DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVE : To analyze influence lipid control cardiorespiratory exercise test two subgroup . DESIGN : Parallel trial study . PARTICIPANTS : The sample consist 40 elderly people , male female , divide two group : 20 hypertensive ( G1 ; 68.50 ±5.85 year ) 20 diabetic-hypertensive ( G2 ; 68.95 ±6.79 year ) . MEASUREMENTS : Nutritional status ; glucose lipid control - postprandial glucose ( PPG ) , triglyceride ( TG ) , total cholesterol ( TC ) , low density lipoprotein ( LDL-C ) , low density lipoprotein ( VLDL-C ) , high density lipoprotein ( HDL-C ) ; blood pressure , cardiorespiratory performance . The significance level set p < 0.05 .
